query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `campaignRecipients` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `campaignId` int NOT NULL,
  `candidateId` int NOT NULL,
  `email` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `personalizedSubject` varchar(500),
  `personalizedBody` text,
  `status` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `sentAt` timestamp,
  `openedAt` timestamp,
  `clickedAt` timestamp,
  `bouncedAt` timestamp,
  `repliedAt` timestamp,
  `trackingId` varchar(100),
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  CONSTRAINT `campaignRecipients_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `campaignRecipients_campaignId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`campaignId`) REFERENCES `emailCampaigns`(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `campaignRecipients_candidateId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`candidateId`) REFERENCES `candidates`(`id`)
);
command:

  CONSTRAINT `campaignRecipients_candidateId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`candidateId`) REFERENCES `candidates`(`id`)
);
